pred_ans_conf_OE: Pulmonary fibrosis, pneumoconiosis, and sarcoidosis.These illnesses are caused by damage to the alveoli of the lungs because they all involve inflammation and scarring of the lung tissue, which can lead to the destruction of the alveoli and impair the lung's ability to exchange oxygen and carbon dioxide.
